thread.section_title: McElhinneys Department Store Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of McElhinneys Department Store | mcelhinneys.com
thread.title: CustomerAnn
thread.title_full: McElhinneys Department Store reviewed by CustomerAnn

author: CustomerAnn
title: CustomerAnn
text: I ordered a number of items from McElhinneys and received my order within 24 hours. I had to return an item and it was collected from my home within 24 hours and my account was refunded very quickly. Really excellent service. Products were fab. Well done Mc Elhinneys ...highly recommended.
